scenario_text.value: Kaito... I’m scared now...

Miu... You good?
Wanna hold my hand?
Sure... Oh.
Your hand feels so cool, bro...
What should I say to Kaito and Miu?
You sure get along.
You two can handle it.
It’s no time for fear.
You two sure get along.

Well sure... Anyone would get freaked out by
this. Miu’s even worse off than me...

Yeah... I’m getting chills just thinking
about all this...
You two can handle this.
Yeah, you’re right, man.

As long as you and me stick together, we’ll
make it through, Miu.
Yeah... Thanks, bro.

This is no time for fear. We could be in
a battle at any moment.
I know, man. Still...look how scared Miu is.
Sorry, Takuma... I’ll do what I can...

Listen up, everyone. I think I spotted a path
of some sort up ahead.
Really?!
Yes, over here. Come, follow me.
